short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The world's most powerful quotes to inspire and motivate you every day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Golden Words" is designed to spread positivity and inspiration during these unprecedented times. With this extension, users can receive a daily dose of the most powerful quotes from around the world. Whether you need a boost of motivation or simply want to start your day on a positive note, "Golden Words" has you covered. Let our extension help you find the inspiration you need to make the most of every day.

If you have any favorite quotes you'd like to see on this extension, please email us.

Features:

1. Quotes are displayed in both the pop-up window and the browser's new tab.
2. Users can configure the frequency of the quote display in a new tab.
3. The displayed quote changes automatically every day. If you don't like the current quote, you can change it using the left or right arrow button.
4. Quotes are auto-updated every week.
5. A dark theme is available.

Be kind to one another <3

Have a great day!
